titles.title: A resolution to congratulate the University of Tennessee Lady Vols and their coach, Pat Head Summitt on winning the 1987 NCAA National Women's Basketball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/30/1987--Introduced. Congratulates Pat Head Summitt and the University of Tennessee Lady Vols on becoming the NCAA Women's Basketball Champions for 1987.
